revision.text: ==Effort Values (EVs)== EVs are a damage multiplying stat for each individual Pokémon that can currently only be seen in the Pokédex page for that Pokémon. EVs for a Pokémon can currently only be increased by catching that Pokémon again after it has caught the Pokérus. Gaining EVs can be done by catching a Pokémon on a [[Route Statistics|Route]], in a [[Dungeon]], or via [[Evolution Items]]. [[Breeding]] and [[Wandering Pokémon]] do not count for gaining EVs.
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
